column4: help... xmms crashed and wont open... i now get a error about libpixmap.so.. any ideas?
help... xmms crashed and wont open... i now get a error about libpixmap.so.. any ideas?
it may be that xmms' lock file is still in place, check ~/.xmms for it
it should have lock in the filename
i dont see anything with lock.... everything in here is right (i think :/ )
you can post the error in pastebin if you want
do "ldconfig -v" no need to paste the results
then do "ldd `which xmms`" and paste the result
weird, did you install a theme or something while xmms was running?
i tryed plain a wma and GDM died after i restarted GDM it wouldnt run
i thought of suggesting cleaning /tmp, but that would screw up things...
